name: Get the Intel!
description:
In Get the Intel, your mission is to.. well... Get the Intel, the top secret document suitcase. To get it, you have a cannon, that can parachute green soldiers on the level, or flower seeds, that will distract enemy soldiers!

Once your soldiers are in place, you can order them to take down enemies, or to activate mechanisms!

There is currently only two levels in this game, just to test out different ideas I had.
